content:
Dear Sir/Madam,
Hope everyone is fine and doing well. I am working on the project in the HL 7 data standards. I need a HL7 v2 messages dataset. If anyone have or know about any data set(v2 messages), then I would be so thankful if he/she can share with me( email: mohd.ayazkn@gmail.com).
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Thanks,
Ayaz,
Email: mohd.ayazkn@gmail.com
What do you mean by message dataset?

Dear Frank,
I mean any dataset which contain the HL7 v2 messages data. I mean labs data of any hospitals etc. ,which are in v2 messages structure.
If you have then I would be so thankful, if you could please share with me.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Thanks,
Ayaz

So you are talking about all fields of all segments!? That are app. 2500 elements.
www.hl7.eu/HL7v2x/v29/hl7v29datel.htm

Dear Frank,
Thanks for your prompt response. I am not talking about fields of all segments. I am talking about dataset, mean, the real labs data of any health care systems. For example, record of patients and their tests of HIS of any hospital in HL7 v2 format.
If you have then please share it.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Thank,
Ayaz
It seems that it only requires v2 data. So you may get more responses in the v2 stream.
The data is always depending on the use case. So it may help to be more specific...

Ayaz,
that is data that cannot be shared - if you are looking for example data
for reporting to public health (lab, syndromic, immunization) as well as
lab orders and result reporting you can go to the NIST portal and download

  • go to the documentation page for each of the tools of the use cases you
    are interested in: https://hl7v2tools.nist.gov/portal/#/tools

Riki Merrick
Vernetzt, LLC
rikimerrick@gmail.com
cell: 916.216.0052
skype: riki.merrick
You may be interested though in the Batch capabilities of v2 to get a set of patients' lab results in one large data set.
